name: The Devil's Gospel
description:
A simple sin can grow into a deal your soul cannot fulfill...
Seven souls for your filthy one...

Would you make the trade if you had little choice?

("The Devil's Gospel" is a game designed and created for #asylumjam2017 )

-------

Creative Team:

Written, Programmed, and Directed by Michaela Laws
Edited by Genevieve Rose and John Depa
Music Composed by Christopher Escalante

Preacher Harlowe - Jonah Scott
The Devil Girl, Victims, and Angel - Michaela Laws
Helen - Genevieve Rose
Sinful Woman - Hayden Daviau
Drunken Man, Policeman - Bradley Gareth
Doctor - "MadamSharky"

-------

Many thanks to everyone who watched Michaela develop it in 48 hours for the Game Jam!
